query.name: campaignType
query.description: Unlock different ways to bids, select products, and keywords with campaign types.

query.name: bizCode
query.description: Decided to choose which advertisement solution.SD:sponsoredSearch.

query.name: placementList
query.description: Placements determine where shoppers will see your promoted products.3:Search Result Page;4:Just For You Page

query.name: campaignObjectLive
query.description: Your campaign objective helps determine your bidding strategy - Traffic objective helps you to increase the number of clicks to your store, while sales objective helps to increase your storeâ€™s sales.1:Traffic;2:Sales.

query.name: maxCpc
query.description: Max bid determines the highest amount that you're willing to pay for a click on your promoted product.-1 means no limit.

query.name: categoryId
query.description: Input category id to exact search.

query.name: itemIdBlackList
query.description: Input item id which you do not want put into result.

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/sponsor/solutions/product/searchProductWithPage')
request.add_api_parameter("brandName", "adidas")
request.add_api_parameter("campaignType", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("pageSize", "20")
request.add_api_parameter("bizCode", "sponsoredSearch")
request.add_api_parameter("placementList", "[3,4]")
request.add_api_parameter("productName", "star")
request.add_api_parameter("campaignObjectLive", "2")
request.add_api_parameter("eligible", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("pageNo", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("sellerSku", "sku1")
request.add_api_parameter("maxCpc", "-1")
request.add_api_parameter("categoryId", "7939")
request.add_api_parameter("itemIdBlackList", "[321]")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/sponsor/solutions/product/searchProductWithPage')
request.add_api_param('brandName', 'adidas')
request.add_api_param('campaignType', '1')
request.add_api_param('pageSize', '20')
request.add_api_param('bizCode', 'sponsoredSearch')
request.add_api_param('placementList', '[3,4]')
request.add_api_param('productName', 'star')
request.add_api_param('campaignObjectLive', '2')
request.add_api_param('eligible', '1')
request.add_api_param('pageNo', '1')
request.add_api_param('sellerSku', 'sku1')
request.add_api_param('maxCpc', '-1')
request.add_api_param('categoryId', '7939')
request.add_api_param('itemIdBlackList', '[321]')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

schema.name: result
schema.description: The detail result, for this api is product detail info.

schema.name: success
schema.description: System result for this api call.

schema.name: analyseTraceId
schema.description: If the api call failed, you could find us with this.

schema.name: errorMsg
schema.description: If the api call failed, this field will show the detail reason.
